member.name: M:Snowden.Reconcilor.Bhpbio.Website.Approval.ApprovalCheck.GetRowLocationEditPermission(System.Data.DataRow,System.Int32,Snowden.Reconcilor.Bhpbio.Report.Types.ReportSession,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.Int32,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Read the row and get the edit permissions for the user. Use a cache mechanism to reduce hits to database.

member.name: M:Snowden.Reconcilor.Bhpbio.Website.Approval.ApprovalCheck.IsApprovalLocked(System.String,System.Int32,Snowden.Reconcilor.Bhpbio.Report.Types.ReportSession)
member.summary:
The row("PresentationLocked") value is used to determine whether or not the checkbox will be enabled. Now that we have a drill down tree we need to remove the value in the row("PresentationLocked") in some circumstances, but not others. The only differentiation I can find is the value in row("PresentationLocked"). So, I'm forced to empty the row("PresentationLocked") value under certain conditions, and *only for certain row("PresentationLocked") values*.
This method confirms whether or not the Checkbox should've been disabled due to not all blastblocks/F1/F2/F3 being approved at the current level, not the parent level.

member.name: M:Snowden.Reconcilor.Bhpbio.Website.Approval.ApprovalCheck.IsLockedByParent(System.String)
